String.string: [Apex] Between Worlds
"I'm on it."
Speak with {@linkcreature:4#3063#Verdas}.
Use the teleportal device.
Location Unknown
You arrive in an unfamiliar, alien landscape.

Stay focusedâ€”anything could happen!
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
Location Unknown - Outer Area
Something is coming.

Go up the stairs.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
Location Unknown - Center Area
The Black Dragon!

Confront the Black Dragon.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Defeat Khemadia.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Use Mystel's Aura. (You must be able to learn all new skills.)
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
What...? Did the Black Dragon kill me?

Use Mystel's Aura to enter the Inner Abyss.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Defeat your Inner Demons.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
"I guess I have no choice."

Speak with Mystel.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
